Talents.Name: Lantern Lit, Thy Dream Sought
Talents.Description: Can use up to 5 Summons (max 3 deployed at once). Summons' effect changes based upon Skill

Talents.Name: So is Writ, an Ode to Wine
Talents.Description: When a summon is defeated/absorbed/retrieved, <Operator Name> gains +3 SP and ATK +3% (ATK increase stacks up to 5 times)
